name: medical
description: Medical imaging prompts covering X-rays, scans, and clinical scenarios
prompts: a chest X-ray showing healthy lungs with clear airways
an MRI scan of a human brain with detailed cross-section
a detailed anatomical diagram of the human heart with labeled chambers
a set of surgical tools laid out on a sterile tray in an operating room
a modern hospital room with medical equipment and a patient bed
a close-up of a stethoscope resting on a medical chart
a dental X-ray showing a full set of teeth and jawbone
a microscope view of red and white blood cells
an ultrasound image of a developing fetus at 20 weeks
a medical illustration of the human skeletal system from the front
